prompts: Create a giant, robotic Pokemon that showcases immense strength and resilience.
Show me a Pokemon with heavy armor and powerful claw-like hands for combat.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of creation and power.
Generate a Pokemon with a humanoid shape and a mix of metallic colors.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains and has a fierce demeanor.
Design a mythical creature with a robust build and the ability to control time.
Give me a Pokemon that appears both intimidating and majestic at the same time.
